title: Keb Needs a Home
description: A hermit crab named Keb outgrows his shell and must find a new one. Keb is chased by seagulls and teased by other hermit crabs because he looks naked without a home. After trying out various homes, Keb finally finds a blue boot that has washed ashore.
highFrequencyWords: advantages, discarded, enormity, envious, handsome, proper, proportions, seaweed, spectacular
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Quotation Marks                : Understand the use of quotation marks
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
